Articles.Content: lol is this isn\'t stock right? anyway its cool but the struts make it look a bit messy, but I guess it cant fly well without them ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
